name: The Being
description:
You  awake in an unknown prison surrounded by lizard creatures. But something isn't right.. other than the lizards, you feel something moving inside your chest. The lizards.. they must have implanted you with some kind of "Being". It's strange you feel some sort of bond with it, almost to the point that your life might depend you keeping it alive.

PRO-TIP: Once the being dies you have 20 seconds to regain some power before it full dies.
